backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with hotel, room, booking, payment, and invite-token data models and storage, plus initialization constants and mutable state. Includes numerous public types used across the backend API.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions and conversion scaffolding for migrating old hotel, room, booking, and user data structures to updated formats. Provides compatibility types for upgrade logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to impacted files, components, and test IDs used for audit and verification. Documents recent room, promo pricing, photo management, and room-editing features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level descriptions of major frontend files, covering routing, hooks, layout, pages, and components with focus on booking, hotel management, and admin workflows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: A pre‑release regression checklist detailing tests for authentication, role handling, booking flows, hotel management, payments, and activation gating across versions.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Template and detailed notes for multiple releases, covering deploy UI issues, HOTEL DUMMY cleanup, ghost room prevention, and legacy data cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Query, routing, auth/role gates, and the main app shell.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the frontend build version constant v33.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin table displaying all bookings with loading, error, and detail views.
frontend/src/components/admin/CaffeineDe: Informational admin alert about Caffeine deploy UI sometimes missing the Publish URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/DataCleanu: Admin tools for removing legacy room photos and outdated payment methods from specific hotels.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Admin panel listing hotels with controls to toggle activation and update subscription status.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Interface to generate, validate, and list invite tokens tied to hotel principals.
frontend/src/components/admin/PrincipalP: Form for admins to validate a principal ID and permanently purge all associated hotel data.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with role details and optional hotel activation flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Error screen shown when permission checks fail, with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Form for hotels to validate and consume invite tokens to activate their accounts.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter basic info before accessing children; handles form validation and profile creation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and forces login via Internet Identity, showing loading and login prompts when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role, admin status, and optional hotel activation to gate access, showing loading, error, or denial screens accordingly.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Displays a modal with detailed booking information and optional guest principal copying.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating a booking with validation, price calculation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Shows a badge with the booking status and matched visual variant.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Lists user bookings with status, details, and cancellation flow, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Dialog for viewing an image at large size with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Displays authentication diagnostics including principal ID, role, admin status, and hotel activation using various query hooks.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Fetches and manages hotel bookings with actions for confirming or canceling bookings and displays states for loading, errors, or empty results.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Shows and updates a hotel’s payment methods, allowing adding or removing methods with backend updates and refetching.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Loads and edits a hotel’s profile information with form fields and submits updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Static panel indicating that stay recording is unavailable until backend support is implemented.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Displays room photos with validation and optional editing features including replacement and deletion of images.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages creating, editing, deleting hotel rooms with image uploads, form validation, and pricing logic.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription status with badges and messages, and shows admin contact card when inactive.
Provides the main app layout with top navigation, content area, and footer showing build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Renders a language dropdown allowing users to switch the UI locale (currently only English).
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing links and account actions based on authentication, admin status, and hotel activation.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Displays admin contact info and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription scenarios.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Shows a hotel's payment methods and provides quick WhatsApp and email contact buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity, handling auth client creation, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data tied to the authenticated user’s role, profile, and hotel-related status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Implements a hook for uploading images by converting them to data URLs with progress tracking.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Provides a locale context with persistence in localStorage and a hook for accessing and updating the current locale.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays the user's account status, roles, hotel access, and invite token actions with various refresh and copy utilities.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with panels for invites, hotel visibility, bookings, data cleanup, and principal management.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of hotels with representative photos, handles loading states, and allows navigating to hotel details with image preview support.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Provides guest account overview with links to bookings, account status, and a bookings table.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Renders the hotel management portal with tabs, activation checks, and panels for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed hotel information, contact data, room listings, and booking form based on selected room.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Landing menu directing users to guest or hotel portals, adapting options based on authentication and hotel activation status.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Displays user bookings with navigation shortcuts to hotel browsing and account status pages.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums for bookings, hotels, rooms, payments, and user profiles matching backend data.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility enabling debug mode based on environment or URL query parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides currency formatting utilities, symbols, names, and validation for supported currencies.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Provides validation and filtering utilities for room picture URLs and tracks failed image loads.
frontend/src/utils/roomPricing.ts: Implements bigint‑safe promo validation, discounted price calculation, and promo display formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, required features, architectural notes, and pending enhancement requests.
